snippet.title: Zero Gravity - C64 - EAS Software 1988
snippet.description:
Zero Gravity for the Commodore 64. Released by EAS Software in 1986.

Zero Gravity can be best described as a Pong clone at it's most basic level. However it featured it's own twist on this basic concept by including a three dimensional view, split screen and wall panels the provided power-ups. 

This video was intended to showcase the music from the game which I still think is one of the best tunes on the C64. I however recorded the demo screen so that it gave people something else to look at rather than the box art.
